overwatch.db

Class EnhancedResultSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.db.EnhancedResultSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object[]>

    public class EnhancedResultSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object[]>
    Provides a nicer interface for reading SQL results. It's not tied to a DB connection, is iterable, has random access, and allows you to access rows and columns as arrays. Uses zero-based indeces.
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    Lee Coakley
